diligent.title: Senior Software Engineer at Diligent
diligent.description: As a Senior Software Engineer at Diligent, I’ve contributed to a variety of tasks, including developing new features for legacy on-prem versions of our software, enhancing API tests, and fixing bugs across both the backend and frontend. Currently, I am focused on rewriting the system to be cloud-native on AWS, while continuing to add new features to both the frontend and backend. In addition, I’ve been working with AWS CDK to streamline infrastructure management, ensuring a more scalable and efficient system.
diligent.tags: AWS CDK, AWS Fargate, AWS Api Gateway,.NET 9,ASP.NET CORE, REST API,React,Playwright,Cypress, Fullstack

civilTolna.title: IT Technician (contract) at DUPI
civilTolna.description: As a key technical contributor at the Civic Association, I’m responsible for addressing and overcoming any technical challenges that arise. My primary focus is maintaining and improving the association’s main website, which is built using Angular 6 and hosted on Firebase. This site functions as a mini Content Management System (CMS), allowing users to add and manage news posts using CKEditor. I also developed functionality to create dynamic 'template' pages, which are built using CKEditor and loaded from Firestore. Additionally, I implemented file upload capabilities through Firebase Storage, enabling smooth management of assets.

agco.title: IT Devloper II (MES) at AGCO
agco.description: At AGCO, I developed and maintained a web API for the Manufacturing Execution System (MES) used across AGCO factories, focusing on scalable and secure backend solutions. I contributed to feature development, including permission handling and role-based access control, to ensure secure data management. Additionally, I worked on regular system maintenance and implemented quality-of-life improvements to enhance performance, stability, and usability.

png.title: Backend Developer at Play'n GO
png.description: I extended the CI/CD pipeline for iOS clients, improving the development and deployment process. I developed an external client module to display game history for slot games, enhancing user data access. I also automated several internal manual processes, creating tools to streamline workflows. In addition, I developed the logic for two video slot games and prepared games for new jurisdictions, smoothening the process of converting 50 games for the new market and making the remaining 300+ games available. This ensured compliance with new market regulations.

projects.title: Projects
projects.intro: Here are some projects I've worked on in my freetime, showcasing my skills in backend and frontend development.

bosz.description: A comprehensive portal built for my high school's alumni community, featuring a user-friendly interface for members to connect, share updates, and stay informed. The site also included an admin panel with a mini CMS for managing content.

civilTolna.title: Civil Tolna site
civilTolna.shortDescription: Official information site for Tolna County Civil Community Service Center
civilTolna.description:
Tolna County Civil Community Service Center is a web platform designed to support and engage the local civic community. The site serves as an information hub, featuring weekly updates with news articles, reference documents, and newsletters. It also includes a public civic database for transparent and easy access to relevant community resources. 
Built with a user-friendly interface and a robust mini CMS for administrators, the platform enables efficient content management and ensures that vital updates are promptly delivered to the community.

keyFeatures.title: Weekly News Updates
keyFeatures.desc: Easily publish and manage community-related news to keep users informed.

keyFeatures.title: Reference Documents & Newsletters
keyFeatures.desc: Centralized repository for downloadable documents and periodic newsletters.

keyFeatures.title: Public Civic Database
keyFeatures.desc: Transparent and accessible database for community members to find relevant information about local organizations and initiatives.

keyFeatures.title: Admin Mini CMS
keyFeatures.desc: Simplified content management system for administrators to add and update site content efficiently.

tictactoe.title: Tic-Tac-Toe Game
tictactoe.shortDescription: A customizable Tic-Tac-Toe game built with Angular, featuring adjustable grid size (up to 8x8) and win conditions for added challenge and flexibility.
tictactoe.description: This Tic-Tac-Toe game takes the classic concept to the next level with customizable gameplay options. Built using Angular, it allows users to set the grid size up to 8x8 and define the number of consecutive marks needed to win (up to 8). The clean and responsive interface ensures an engaging experience on all devices. Whether for casual play or testing strategic skills on larger boards, this project adds a fun twist to the timeless game.

spockup.title: Spockup
spockup.description:
The intention of this applicaiton is to provide a functionaility for all Spotify users to backup their favourite playlists. You can create a backup at any time and do changes on the original list. Do you like the old version better? Just restore it from the backup.
This app hasn't been released yet.

keyFeatures.title: Backup playlist

keyFeatures.title: Restore from backup
